summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing the Department of Planning, providing for its organization and duties; creating and transferring positions; transferring functions from other departments; adding a new Chapter 3.37 to the Seattle Municipal Code; transferring the Design Review functions to the Department of Construction and Land Use; and repealing the SMC Sections 3.14.2000 - 2050 and Sections 3.14.3000 - 3070.
